PersonalStatement.text: April Griffin, born on 1992-07-12, is a Female based in Kathrynfort, Saint Kitts and Nevis. She is Divorced and holds Slovak nationality. Currently working at Moss-Vargas.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Casey LLC from 2009 to 2020.
Senior Data Analyst at Moss-Vargas, 2017 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from University of Leicester
Master's in Engineering from Sciences Po

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.
Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys painting.
